changelog.zh:
- 新增：频道台标自动匹配功能，预埋1088条台标数据
- 新增：支持TXT格式播放列表自动显示台标
- 新增：智能模糊匹配算法（如"CCTV1-综合"自动匹配"CCTV1"）
- 新增：三级优先级加载（M3U台标→数据库台标→默认图片）
- 新增：GitHub代理加速台标图片加载
- 优化：台标缓存机制，提升加载速度
- 优化：首页、分类、搜索、收藏、多屏播放页面台标显示
- 修复：台标加载失败时的降级处理
changelog.en:
- Added: Automatic channel logo matching with 1088 pre-embedded logos
- Added: Auto-display logos for TXT format playlists
- Added: Smart fuzzy matching (e.g., "CCTV1-综合" matches "CCTV1")
- Added: Three-level priority loading (M3U logo → Database logo → Default image)
- Added: GitHub proxy for faster logo loading
- Improved: Logo caching mechanism for better performance
- Improved: Logo display in home, channels, search, favorites, and multi-screen
- Fixed: Fallback handling when logo loading fails
